vtta-iconizer.icon-directory.name: Icon directory
vtta-iconizer.icon-directory.hint: Specificy the icon location on the server, relative to the Foundry /Data directory, e.g. 'iconizer' is '[Foundry]/Data/iconizer'.
vtta-iconizer.replacement-policy.name: Icon replacement policy
vtta-iconizer.replacement-policy.hint: Defines if the icons of items should be set automatically
vtta-iconizer.icon-database-policy.name: Icon database policy
vtta-iconizer.icon-database-policy.hint: Defines which databases should be used when deciding on the new icon. A custom database is a JSON-file in the icon directory named 'icons.json'. See vtta-iconizer/data/icons.json for an example format. Note: Changing this setting requires a reload.
vtta-iconizer.icon-database-policy.1: Use the predefined database and my custom one
